is the capital of Khentii Aimag aand near the birthplace of Genghis Khan.

While relatively close to the capital,
, most of the region isn't yet connected to the center of the country by paved roads. As of 2013, paved roads ends just past
. Though, there are still plenty of options for buses to the provincial capitals and daily flights to
. Airports in Ondorkhaan and Baruun-Urt no longer have scheduled flights to UB. There is a rail line from Choibalsan to Russia, but with no passengers service currently.
Getting to a province in Mongolia from the capital is much easier than going between provinces. The best strategy is starting as far from UB as you wish to go, say
, and working your way back to Ulaanbaatar. There are shared jeeps between provincial capitals and from the cities to the countryside.
